summary: A test suite that validates the functionality of the Dyson 360 Eye robot vacuum integration, covering device setup, message processing, property exposure, polling behavior, and control commands such as start, pause, stop, turn on/off, fan speed adjustment, and return‑to‑base.
business_intent: Guarantee reliable operation and quality of the Dyson robot vacuum component within the automation platform by automatically detecting regressions and ensuring all features work as expected.
